item.description:
A model shoot featuring Caitlin Weiler

You can find photos of Caitlin at these sites:

 

http://kimpanzarella.com/store/index.php?main_page=page_2

http://www.missmassachusettsusa.com/contestantphotos.html

 

Here is an opportunity to improve your studio & glamour  photography skills. Caitlin will be  modeling a couple of different outfits.

We have decided to compensate models for future shoots. As a result, we will be charging $25 for this event. The fee must be paid in advance. To ensure each attendee has enough time to shoot, we are limiting this event to 10 photographers.

 

(The date has been moved up one week because of the holiday)

 

============================================

Additional requirements:

1) Your dSLR needs to have a hot shoe that can trigger a pocket wizard, or you have a PC sync jack on your camera, or you have a pop up flash

2) You know how to put your camera into manual mode so you can adjust shutter speed and aperture independently

3) For your pop up flash, you know how to set that to manual output, lowest setting, typically 1/128 power

4) You know how to select flash white balance

Recommended lens focal length: 50 mm or higher on a full frame, 35mm or higher on a cropped frame sensor, and ISO 200
item.how_to_find_us: Park near Bedford Cleaners and enter through adjacent doors to 2nd floor, Suite 248
item.name: Photo shoot with Caitlyn Weiler (Miss Massachusetts USA 2012 Contestant)
